verses.text: These \add are\add* now the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and \add this is\add* the \w genealogy|strong="H3187"\w* of them that went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* with me from \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, in the \w reign|strong="H4438"\w* of \w Artaxerxes|strong="H0783"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

Of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Phinehas|strong="H6372"\w*; \w Gershom|strong="H1647"\w*: of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ithamar|strong="H0385"\w*; \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w*: of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*; \w Hattush|strong="H2407"\w*.

Of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shechaniah|strong="H7935"\w*, of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Pharosh|strong="H6551"\w*; \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*: and with him were reckoned by \w genealogy|strong="H3187"\w* of the \w males|strong="H2145"\w* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w*.

Of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Pahath-moab|strong="H6355"\w*; \w Elihoenai|strong="H0454"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zerahiah|strong="H2228"\w*, and with him two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w males|strong="H2145"\w*.

Of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shechaniah|strong="H7935"\w*; the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jahaziel|strong="H3166"\w*, and with him \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w males|strong="H2145"\w*.

Of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* also of \w Adin|strong="H5720"\w*; \w Ebed|strong="H5651"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w*, and with him \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w males|strong="H2145"\w*.

And of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Elam|strong="H5867"\w*; \w Jeshaiah|strong="H3470"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Athaliah|strong="H6271"\w*, and with him \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w males|strong="H2145"\w*.

And of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shephatiah|strong="H8203"\w*; \w Zebadiah|strong="H2069"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Michael|strong="H4317"\w*, and with him \w fourscore|strong="H8084"\w* \w males|strong="H2145"\w*.

Of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*; \w Obadiah|strong="H5662"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehiel|strong="H3171"\w*, and with him two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w eighteen|strong="H8083"\w* \w males|strong="H2145"\w*.

And of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shelomith|strong="H8019"\w*; the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Josiphiah|strong="H3131"\w*, and with him an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* \w males|strong="H2145"\w*.

And of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Bebai|strong="H0893"\w*; \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Bebai|strong="H0893"\w*, and with him \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w males|strong="H2145"\w*.

And of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Azgad|strong="H5803"\w*; \w Johanan|strong="H3110"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hakkatan|strong="H6997"\w*, and with him an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w males|strong="H2145"\w*.\f + \fr 8.12 \ft the son…: or, the youngest son\f*

And of the \w last|strong="H0314"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Adonikam|strong="H0140"\w*, whose \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \add are\add* these, \w Eliphelet|strong="H0467"\w*, \w Jeiel|strong="H3273"\w*, and \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w*, and with them \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* \w males|strong="H2145"\w*.

Of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* also of \w Bigvai|strong="H0902"\w*; \w Uthai|strong="H5793"\w*, and \w Zabbud|strong="H2072"\w*, and with them \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w males|strong="H2145"\w*.\f + \fr 8.14 \ft Zabbud: or, Zaccur, as some read\f*

¶ And I gathered them \w together|strong="H6908"\w* to the \w river|strong="H5104"\w* that \w runneth|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Ahava|strong="H0163"\w*; and there abode we in \w tents|strong="H2583"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*: and I \w viewed|strong="H0995"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, and \w found|strong="H4672"\w* there none of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*.\f + \fr 8.15 \ft abode: or, pitched\f*

Then \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* I for \w Eliezer|strong="H0461"\w*, for \w Ariel|strong="H0740"\w*, for \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w*, and for \w Elnathan|strong="H0494"\w*, and for \w Jarib|strong="H3402"\w*, and for \w Elnathan|strong="H0494"\w*, and for \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w*, and for \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*, and for \w Meshullam|strong="H4918"\w*, chief \w men|strong="H7218"\w*; also for \w Joiarib|strong="H3114"\w*, and for \w Elnathan|strong="H0494"\w*, men of \w understanding|strong="H0995"\w*.

And I \w sent|strong="H6680"\w* them with \w commandment|strong="H3318"\w* unto \w Iddo|strong="H0112"\w* the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* at the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w Casiphia|strong="H3703"\w*, and I \w told|strong="H7760"\w* them \w what|strong="H1697"\w* they should \w say|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Iddo|strong="H0112"\w*, \add and\add* to his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* the \w Nethinims|strong="H5411"\w*, at the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w Casiphia|strong="H3703"\w*, that they should \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* unto us \w ministers|strong="H8334"\w* for the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 8.17 \ft I told…: Heb. I put words in their mouth\f*

And by the \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* upon us they \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* us a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w understanding|strong="H7922"\w*, of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Mahli|strong="H4249"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and \w Sherebiah|strong="H8274"\w*, with his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \w eighteen|strong="H8083"\w*;

And \w Hashabiah|strong="H2811"\w*, and with him \w Jeshaiah|strong="H3470"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*, his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* and their \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w*;

Also of the \w Nethinims|strong="H5411"\w*, whom \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* had \w appointed|strong="H5414"\w* for the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w Nethinims|strong="H5411"\w*: all of them were \w expressed|strong="H5344"\w* by \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

¶ Then I \w proclaimed|strong="H7121"\w* a \w fast|strong="H6685"\w* there, at the \w river|strong="H5104"\w* of \w Ahava|strong="H0163"\w*, that we might \w afflict|strong="H6031"\w* ourselves \w before|strong="H6440"\w* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, to \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* of him a \w right|strong="H3477"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* for us, and for our little \w ones|strong="H2945"\w*, and for all our \w substance|strong="H7399"\w*.

For I was \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* to \w require|strong="H7592"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* a band of \w soldiers|strong="H2428"\w* and \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w* to \w help|strong="H5826"\w* us against the \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*: because we had \w spoken|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* upon all them for \w good|strong="H2896"\w* that \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* him; but his \w power|strong="H5797"\w* and his \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* \add is\add* against all them that \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* him.
So we \w fasted|strong="H6684"\w* and \w besought|strong="H1245"\w* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* for this: and he was \w intreated|strong="H6279"\w* of us.

¶ Then I \w separated|strong="H0914"\w* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* of the \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w Sherebiah|strong="H8274"\w*, \w Hashabiah|strong="H2811"\w*, and \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* of their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* with them,

And \w weighed|strong="H8254"\w* unto them the \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and the \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*, \add even\add* the \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, which the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, and his \w counsellors|strong="H3289"\w*, and his \w lords|strong="H8269"\w*, and all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add there\add* \w present|strong="H4672"\w*, had \w offered|strong="H7311"\w*:

I even \w weighed|strong="H8254"\w* unto their \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w*, \add and\add* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w*;

Also \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w basons|strong="H3713"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, of a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w drams|strong="H0150"\w*; and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of \w fine|strong="H2896"\w* \w copper|strong="H5178"\w*, \w precious|strong="H2532"\w* as \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.\f + \fr 8.27 \ft fine…: Heb. yellow, or, shining brass\f*\f + \fr 8.27 \ft precious: Heb. desirable\f*

And I \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Ye \add are\add* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* \add are\add* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* also; and the \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* and the \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \add are\add* a freewill \w offering|strong="H5071"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

\w Watch|strong="H8245"\w* ye, and \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \add them\add*, until ye \w weigh|strong="H8254"\w* \add them\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, and \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, in the \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

So \w took|strong="H6901"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* the \w weight|strong="H4948"\w* of the \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and the \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*, to \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \add them\add* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

¶ Then we \w departed|strong="H5265"\w* from the \w river|strong="H5104"\w* of \w Ahava|strong="H0163"\w* on the \w twelfth|strong="H8147"\w* \add day\add* of the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, to \w go|strong="H3212"\w* unto \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: and the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* was upon us, and he \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* us from the \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* of the \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*, and of such as lay in \w wait|strong="H0693"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.
And we \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and \w abode|strong="H3427"\w* there \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

¶ Now on the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* was the \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* and the \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* and the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* \w weighed|strong="H8254"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Meremoth|strong="H4822"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Uriah|strong="H0223"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*; and with him \add was\add* \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Phinehas|strong="H6372"\w*; and with them \add was\add* \w Jozabad|strong="H3107"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jeshua|strong="H3442"\w*, and \w Noadiah|strong="H5129"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Binnui|strong="H1131"\w*, \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*;
By \w number|strong="H4557"\w* \add and\add* by \w weight|strong="H4948"\w* of every one: and all the \w weight|strong="H4948"\w* was \w written|strong="H3789"\w* at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w*.

\add Also\add* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of those that had been carried \w away|strong="H1473"\w*, which were come \w out|strong="H0935"\w* of the \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w*, \w offered|strong="H7126"\w* burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* unto the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w bullocks|strong="H6499"\w* for all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w ninety|strong="H8673"\w* and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w*, \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* he \w goats|strong="H6842"\w* \add for\add* a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*: all \add this was\add* a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ And they \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w commissions|strong="H1881"\w* unto the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w lieutenants|strong="H0323"\w*, and to the \w governors|strong="H6346"\w* on this \w side|strong="H5676"\w* the \w river|strong="H5104"\w*: and they \w furthered|strong="H5375"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
